name: Griddled 2D
description:
Description
Your mission (if you choose to accept it) is to guide your 'player' through sixty increasingly tricky levels whilst avoiding destruction by the selection of adversaries which populate each grid. The AI controlled opponents come in four distinct types each with their own individual capabilities, so you'll need to develop effective strategies to remove them from your path.

Griddled 2D is both addictive and frustrating like a puzzle game should be.

Player Guide
To get you started, we've included a player guide which can be accessed from the media page of the VBX Studio web site or the game installation folder.

Technical Information
This release has been optimised to run on a wide range of Microsoft Windows laptop and desktop computers . Griddled 2D is suitable for all age groups.

Game Format
Griddled 2D has a fixed 1024 x 576 resolution.

For additional information please visit the VBX Studio website.
